alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 27 at 1:10PM MST until April 27 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR NORTHERN ARIZONA... * AFFECTED AREA...Locations near Buffalo Pass, Ganado and Window Rock. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 8 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and very low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity before first responders can contain them.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring or are imminent. A combination of strong winds and low relative humidities can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please notify field crews of this Red Flag Warning.
